text: Hini na nina bakholwayo, xa nixelelwa ukuba: “Vulani izithuba phakathi kwenu,” entlanganisweni, vulani izithuba kaloku, uAllâh Uya kunenzela isithuba. Naxa niyalelwe ukuba: “Phakamani,” phakamani; uAllâh Uya kuba phakamisa abo bakholwayo phakathi kwenu nabo babenikwe ulwazi, ngokwamabakala kananjalo uAllâh Unolwazi ngoko nikwenzayo
